title: Am i the only one who insta quits the game after a first loss?
body: Seriously i could win 5 games in a row but as soon as i lose 1 game im like fuck this shit broken game stupid dmg...then ima go play fortnite or heartstone to chill down

replies.body:
You’re suppose to play in sets so you don’t get frustrated. Week days you play a set of 3 games. If you loose one keep playing, if you loose 2 just call it a day, on weekends, you play a set of 5, loose 1 keep playing loose 2? Keep playing loose 3? Call it a day. 

IMO this is an effective strat as it saves your brain energy and your time.
only 1 out of 20 losses do i feel like "damn, we got gotted real good"
